content.detailedDescription: I was in a pick-up with three friends. we had just left a favorite deer hunting spot and were proceeding east along the appleton ridge road. i was on the passenger side (north side of the truck). i noticed a woman on her house steps looking up into the sky and then a man on a tractor pointing toward the sky ne). i then saw what he was pointing at, a silver metallic object approximately 100 feet in length. i told the driver to slow down he was not yet able to see the object. the middle passenger said "what the hell is that?". i said something like, "i don't know but i want to find out". it was slowly crossing the farm field and descending towards the trees that were no more than 500 feet from the road. when it started to go behind the trees the driver got his best view and become very scared and he's not normally prone to fear. he refused to pull over and instead sped off despite our pleas not to. i had previously found a weather balloon before this incident and returned the instrument package as requested on the side plaque. so i can honestly say it was not a weather balloon. the structure remained in complete cigar shape until in disappeared behind the trees. i would estimate it was 100 feet long and 30 feet in diameter in the middle. it had the color of the dull side of aluminum foil but no discernable markings, lights or seams and no sound at all. it looked to be made of solid metal but it is possible it was some type of "blimp" like craft.
content.summary: Deer hunting ufo

content.detailedDescription: When i come from my aunt house i see some lights in sky first i think this was just a plane but after few minutes i know that i am wrong because they look very mystrious and his shape was triangle when he come close ro me my watch was rotating opposite direction and they have no sound and he form a octgon in sky his speed was so fast and when i see this i was very scared i run to my house and i never seen this rhing before sorry for my mistake because i don't know english
content.summary: When i come from my aunt house i see some light in sky first i think this was a plane but after few minutes i realize that i am wrong

content.detailedDescription: July 16th 2015. a few mins before 9 i was laying in bed watching tv with my cat in my bedroom on the second floor of my house. the sun was starting to set. my car went up to the window resting.I went to pretty her and noticed a bright light in the sky. thought it was odd something so bright when no other stars were out. it started to get brighter.I noticed it didn't move for five min. so i grabbed my cellphone and started filming. during filming i got a little shaky and filmed the best i could. called out to my aunt down stairs which you can hear in the video. the video lasted 3 mins because my phone died. a min or so after my phone died my aunt came up stairs and we both were surprised and a little shaken. the object got brighter and hovered. i told her keep watching it and i am going to grab my binoculars from the next room. as i looked through i noticed it was oval in shape and had three to four twinkling/pulsating lights. as we passed back and forth the binoculars, the white lights turned a red-orange color and stayed like that for about the minutes. next brightened white and turned grewn-blue similar to an old christmas light bulb. this lasted for about three mins as well before it flared back to white. after min 20 in the blink of an eye out shoot to my right (north). my aunt and i heard and saw a black helicopter with a red flashing light zoom from our left bottom corner of the window (south east). the helicopter disappeared from sight. the orb/light (s) moved further in the distance. by this time the sun was completely down. noticed the orb/light get further away. a little after 9:30pm we couldn't see anything.
content.summary: 9pm hovered, 10min in got bright changed red-orange 15 min in changes green 20 min in white 25 min heads west

content.detailedDescription: It was around 4:20 am and i was outside having a smoke, star-gazing and this one caught my eye. it was the brightest one in the sky. i was still, under a over-hang and it seemed to be going out of sight - slowly. i kept an eye on it, it went up a little then over and at one point there seemed to be like sparkles come off it! it moved faster by now and just kept going out of sight. it was different seeing something come from it, other times there is just a light. there was one time i called the wife to come see, she watched with me for 5-10 seconds this little white light bounce all across the eastern part of the sky checking out stars like a bird going to flowers. anyway, this time was different so i even called colleen at work and told her. i am still at awe.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw a light in the sky, like a star but much brighter and moved

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my childhood home late one evening find myself looking at the stars. i was standing at the edge of our driveway when i noticed a bright light that got bigger very quickly and materialized almost instantly into a giant disc over my head. it was low enough for me to see a good amount of details however it was a long time ago so i am not exactly sure what everything looked like on it. but as it was hovering overhead it was flashing different color lights on the bottom and after a few seconds it took off at unimaginable speed towards the mountains in the distance just over the horizon. it was strange because i was not shocked by the sudden appearance and felt more of a sense of wonder than anything. it wasn't until i went inside to tell my parents what i had seen and draw a quick picture of it that it really set in what had happened.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo speed over head and then sped off over the mountains

content.detailedDescription:
I want you to know that first i am talking about 2 events in the same location.

second. i have 3 very good pictures that were retrieved from london drugs in vernon from my friends cell phone.

the pictures are awesome and need to be seen. you will like.
 they are real.

i went out side our building and then stopped and looked up.
i thought i saw a dim light. then leaned back more fore a better look.

then i saw a round spire dimly aluminated and transparent slowly moving south just above our apartments. it was then i noticed a second and they where rotating around each other then reversed and back again. i was frightened and yelp for my neibours  at that time i noticed a third a little further from the other two all traveling together. more frightened again i yield for help from neibors. no one herd my cries for help. as it passed over head moving south very slowly and silently i lost sight of the 3 objects over the apartments next door. i thought of following them to the street in hope of maybe stopping a car or someone but gave into fear.
i was shaken, and feared for my life.

i would love to show the picks free.
content.summary: I saw 3 round transparent objects traveling south. i was frightened.

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of 1999 i was seven years of age. my dad brothers, cousin and i were camping in the back yard as we did often in the open air on a tarp. some time in the night (i am unsure of the exact time) i remember waking up in my mind but i had no control over my body. i thought it was morning because there was such bright light i could see through my i lids. i couldn't move. i then as if told or controlled my eyes opened slowly to see an orb hovering above my face. it then moved down the length of my body. when it got to my waist i began to sit up still almost beyond my control. i watched the orb float/hover over to the fence ascend up and the hover above the fence about ten feet away from me. the notion crossed my mind (i think now i was being told) to wake my cousin so we could both see it. but when i looked to her she was already awake looking at me. with out a word after a few seconds of staring at each other we both at the exact same time looked back to the craft and watched as it then changed from a singular orb of light to a domed disc shape with three lights that rotated around it's widest circumference. i dont know how long we were looking at it. the entire time the wind seemed to spin around us almost contained to the immediate area there was a low humming nose and an over all feeling of love and comfort. its the best i have felt in my entire life the safest i have felt my entire life. after a while it changed from three lights to one bright orb of light moved along the top of the fence and then moved with incredible speed away from the yard and over the field behind my home. at that instance the hum and wind were suddenly gone and i fell immediately back to sleep. i did't ask my cousin about it until 7 years latter where she told me she remembered and yes it happened she said it sounds like we were abducted. we have discussed only a few times what we each believed happened but we both feel as though some one has been watching us since then on.
this is not the only orb i have seen and not the only experience i had but i feel this is the start of everything in my life i really want answers and to find out what i might not remember. 

i have been to afraid to report early but now i feel it is time.
content.summary: Ball of light hovering over body witnessed by both my cousin and i

content.detailedDescription: I was working at the time, and it was particularly hot that day. i looked up for some reason, can't remember why. i saw this orb, seemingly transparent, but i could see it. it was floating through the clouds and going in a straight line. it looked small but it was very high above me. i ended up writing it off as it just being too hot and i saw something, but i've never seen anything quite like that before in my life.
content.summary: A seemingly transparent orb was floating or flying in a straight line above me

content.detailedDescription: Yo estaba subiendo al tercer piso y cuando llegue observã© el objeto por mi ventana y me quede observã¡ndolo porque al principio parecã­a un globo de helio y despuã©s bajo y note que no era un globo porque despuã©s continuã³ siguiendo su trayectoria hacia la izquierda y subã­a y bajaba y giraba sobre su eje muy despacio y tambiã©n emitã­a dos luces una verde y otra amarilla anaranjada,cuando estaba viendo el objeto tenã­a dos opciones de que podã­a ser,podã­a ser o un dron o un ovni y despuã©s el objeto se fue alejando y despuã©s se perdiã³ en lo lejos de unos ã¡rboles y pensã© que era un dron muy bueno porque tenã­a un gran alcance y hasta ahora no se que fue lo que vi.
content.summary: Objeto  en forma de dirigible con tenazas se movã­a lento y cambiaba de direcciã³n hasta que desapareciã³ en la lejanã­a

content.detailedDescription: the evening of july 8, 2015 i was driving alone along a pa state highway interstate when i saw an unknown unimaginable ufo object in my front view as i was driving approximately 70 mph. it was blinking in and out moving at a slow and steady pace, moving down and forward. i was in complete disbelief by what i was seeing because the first thing that came to mind was a ufo because it was not anything of a ordinary flying object that's man made. the object itself looked like it was made of ruby, like a jewel, it had 4 solid circle beams of light that was gold colored and bright that surrounded the dome cylinder shaped bottom but the light that projected the beam that came down appeared to come from the center of the object. it was in view for about a a minute or longer. to my amazement i just stared as it blinked in and out i was trying to phathom what i was seeing while trying to stay safe on the road. there was no other vehicles on the road besides a truck in the distance behind me. i didn't think about stopping but i slowed down so i could go to my camera on my cell phone to capture what i could before it left my view. one picture came out purple i don't know if it was because my hand covered the camera i don't know but the other picture shows a glimpse of part of what it was. i don't believe that there will ever be enough technology to fully capture the true essence of what had appeared, it was from another dimension not of this world. it is complex to describe because what my camera captured wasn't exactly what was before me as if it was transformed but still had the characteristics and form of ufo with a distinct crusted pattern like a ruby jewel, something i'll never forget.
content.features: Dome, Window(s), Patterned Surface, Wings, Unknown
content.summary: It was the evening of july 8th 2015 i witnessed an unknown unimaginable ufo appearance moving along midair as i was driving

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my car going home.
red blinking lights.
red reflectors.
it did not move at all, it was landed when i saw it, behind a burnt down house.
noticed it around 20 till, circled back and watched it twice each time i went past, never moved, just blinked.
trees became between it and i.
content.summary: Noticed red blinking lights, then went back and looked at it, watched it for five minutes, stationary

content.detailedDescription:
looking into night sky
came from south from lake ontario   moving slowly no noise to northeast orange glow square made 2 flight paths in same direction
did not look like a plane or helicopter no sound
plane travels at about 100-200 mph
felt wierd 
moved into clouds
content.summary: Orange glow moving slowing

content.detailedDescription: Was outside having a fire on property looking at the night sky and my wife and i were fixated on one "star" it was brighter than the rest but had a dimmer star almost directly below it. as we were looking at it, all of a sudden it became way brighter and start moving east as it was doing this 3 more fainter objects appeared and started circling the brighter object for roughly 5 minutes. the bright one went near its original position but would move periodically over the next couple hours and we also witnessed the smaller objects flying in straight paths over the same period.
content.summary: Saw 1

content.detailedDescription:
Let me first state that i was not able to see anything visually, i am not sure if this even qualifies as a ufo sighting but i did not know who else to report this to. it was about 5:00pm yesterday afternoon, i was standing outside on my back porch, the sky was clear i had been sitting in the sun throughout the day and pulling weeds out of the garden earlier. so as i was standing there, out of nowhere the was a loud sound similar to a jet or a large plane at first but it suddenly got much louder and sounded like a missile or a bomb dropping? i have never heard one personally but it was the only comparison i can think of right now.?  

it was so deafeningly loud and i could feel the base from it in my body and in the ground. i was so afraid that our entire city was about to be blown up that i ran inside and tried to get my family into the basement. my mother and girlfriend heard  the noise as well 
 
it sounded like something getting closer and closer and then there was nothing, i kept wairing for a shockwave or something, i was terified. after i felt like it was okay and caught my breath, i went back upstairs to be laughed at and told it was probably just a plane, i looked around, out front , out back, every direction and i could not see a plane or vapour trail of any kind anywhere. we live close to a local airport so i hear a lot of planes and have been to air shows and am very familiar with the sound of commercial jets and military jets and small air crafts, the sound i heard was nothing like that or nothing i have ever heard in person. 

i contacted my father in pickering , 2 cities to the west , about 40km away and asked him if he had heard anything, he stated not at all other than the pickering nuclear power plant air raid sirens being tested in the late morning that day. i have no idea if there is any correlation or reason that this sound occurred on the same day, i just thought that small detail could be relevant or may be the underlying cause.? 

i wish i could have seen the object or get some answers as to what could have caused such a loud sound or what kind of object could even create that sound, i would also like to know if anyone else in my area reported this noise? 

i am available for further questioning but i am currently restricted from leaving my residence i'm accordance to my probation right now, i have an ankle bracelet on so i'm not able to leave but you can reach me by phone and email. i do not answer to blocked callers or private numbers, i find it helpful to screen my calls. 

thank you in advance, and i hope this letter is not a waste of time..
content.summary: It sounded like a missile or a bomb dropping , it was felt on the ground around,me

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside of my house smoking a cigarette. i noticed a 3 lights in the sky to my n ne direction. they was hovering in one area stacked on top of each other. the lights would move up and down really fast. i noticed to the west that there was the same lights that appeared. they didnt move at all. while observing the lights to the west, i noticed another set of lights the same color that was doing a cartwheel motion going from the west to east directly above me. the lights would flash. it dissapeared a few times reappearing a long distance away finally dissapearing for good. i looked back to the north ne and notice balls of white light shooting from the lights. there was one ball of white light that absorbed back into the three lights. what threw me for a loop was the night before, i had abserved the same set of lights on the other side of town.
content.summary: Lights above huron south dakota

content.detailedDescription: Walked on my deck to look at the night sky, this is not uncommon for me, looking. i was first looking south over the valley, then i turned to look north, that is when i observed this large object just over the tree line. it had 3-4 larger reddish-orangeish color light in a row. it was stationary for a minute then is darted in an easterly direction. stunned i was trying to figure what i had just saw. i have seen many planes in the night sky, it was not a plane. after pondering i then observed this (or it could have been a second object) with the same lights traveling without sound from the the west to east, while on it's path the lights changed from reddish-orangeish to a white or yellowish but also the light pattern was a triangle (maybe object was turning and i was seeing underneath this object? i like 40-50 miles from the nearest major airport and there are no military bases around me. what was so amazing was the size of this object and there was no sound. i am not saying it was aliens, but it was certainly something i cannot explain.
content.summary: Observed this large object just over the tree line. it had 3-4 larger reddish-orangeish color light in a row

content.detailedDescription: I was sat in my back garden on a lawn chair having a cigarette and watching the clouds, when i noticed a bright silver dart shoot across the sky disappear for a spit second behind the clouds and then shot off in to the distance. if i hadn't been watching the clouds i probably wouldn't of seen it. it was going a lot faster than any aircraft i've ever seen and there was no noise other than the wind. there was no change it altitude or direction not even a slight weave. i don't know what i saw, i just know it wasn't a shooting star or a aircraft
content.summary: A bright silver dart shaped object shot across the sky over my back garden

content.detailedDescription:
July15, 10:30 at night, my visiting grandson, who had gone outside for an item in a vehicle, came in, confused.  he said that while outside he had seen an orange object, about the size of a softball at arm's length, zip by silently overhead, traveling to the east.  at that point i suggested we go outside and take another look.  the skies at night in this rural texas location  are bright, as there is little light pollution.  we talked about what he saw, watching the skies as we talked.  after a few minutes my grandson said, "there's another one!"  he pointed out a moving light in the sky.  the object was star-like, a small dot of light.  when i saw it, watching it move in a straight line for about ten seconds, i told my grandson that it was a satellite because it moved in a straight line, and no sooner did i say that then the light slowed down, then zipped to the east almost in a perpendicular angle.  the object, star-like, zig zagged toward the eastern horizon and then passed out of sight.  when first observed the object flew on a direct path almost due south to north, at about 50 degrees above the horizon.  the object appeared to be flying far, far above the normal flight path of regular commercial jet traffic common to this area.

i have no way of determining or linking any connection between the object first observed by my grandson and the high-flying light we shortly later observed.
content.summary: Bright light on straight, then zig zag, path

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of july 16, 2015, i was closing up the house before bedtime, and checked the lock on the sliding glass door, and happened to look up at the sky. a light caught my eye that was low in the sky, lower than a star would be that bright,and then it began to move to the right. 

i thought it must be a helicopter, but then, it moved to the left, and up and down a bit.  i couldn't understand why it was moving like that, and it was very fluid and smooth.  it became more of an orange glow, then i had my son bring me my binoculars from my desk, and could see its form better, and it looked like a disk with a slight dome on top, but no search lights like a helicopter or plane which i know the difference between normal aircraft. 

for some reason, i left to get something, and when i came back it was gone.  it seemed like it was hovering over the area of town that was brighter from businesses that lit up the sky, and it looked kind of like it was looking for something. i am not sure if i saw a beam of light come down from the craft or not, but i seem to remember that.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Noticed stationary light in sky. watched it thinking it was a star, but then it moved back and forth oddly, up and down, and side ways again. it was all orange and glowing, no other lights on it.  it looked like it was looking for something.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the phone with my cousin. and then look like lightning but more like a shooting star when it was in our atmosphere. my phone cut off i got a little worried and went inside. and that's it. i wanted to know if anyone seen anything like this. thanks...
content.summary: Lighting. shooting star in atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: While traveling west on interstate 80 outside kearney, nebraska i noticed an extremely bright bluish/green flash of light about 20 miles ahead of me at the ten o'clock position. it flashed at the rate of once every 2 seconds.  at each flash the object covered several miles.  it flashed 3 times while travelling east, the next flash was to my 1 o'clock position. the next flash was to my 3 o'clock position,the next was at 6 o'clock and finally at 6 o'clock but 15 miles behind  me. at each flash of light the object cover 5 or more miles. i didn't  see any shape and couldn't determine size because of distance. at first i thought it was light from wind generators but there none.No airport near.  family asleep. so bright it almost hurt to see. the speed was unbelievable.
content.summary: Saw extremely bright bluish green light flash in several locations covering large distances.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my back yard with my dog spanky, and i noticed an object to the left of the moon. i must have seen it while it was lit up (in the middle of blinking) because i thought it was a planet. i looked again in a few seconds and it was gone. i looked through my camera and noticed that it was not gone, but it was stationary and blinking. i don't know if it was communicating with anything on the moon cause it did seem like a pattern. i shot some videos and took pics. then a few minutes later i noticed it moved under the moon and did the same thing. after reviewing my pics and videos i found out that there were 2 objects not just one.
content.summary: I witnessed blinking lights to th left side of the moon.

content.detailedDescription:
I work for a construction company; i am a safety coordinator for construction project in los angeles california. our project is located in hollywood, ca. it was 1:46am and i was sitting in my car at a denny's resturuant parking lot. on our project we have a tower crane; on the crane we have an american flag that is being lit by a light thats attached to the crane just about the flag. i wanted a picture of the flag to show my friends. i rolled down my window, took the picture and thought nothing of it. later on that day i took a closer look at the picture and noticed something strange in the top left quadrant of the photo. it was a very gloomy early thursday morning; there were no visible stars out that night and i did not notice any airplanes nor helicopters while i was in the parking lot. i took the picture with my cell phone camera (iphone 6 plus). 
when i first noticed the ohjects in the picture i quickly got this anxious feeling (never thought i would catch anything on camera)and started to think if the objects could be stars, reflections of light, or even satillites. as i thouught about it more i noticed that the objects look to be in some type of formation or "could this be one big object?". the following night i took my cell phone and attempted to take a picture of the brightest star i could see in the sky. i was not able to see the star on my cell phone screen; i knew then these objects in questions could not be stars. so i decided to send the pictures to the professionals (mufon) so they can take a closer look with their software and try to explain these objects are real or just my imagination. 

thank you. 
sincerely believer.
content.summary: Took a picture and noticed lights in my photo.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were at the bonnaroo music and arts festival in manchester tn june 14, 2013. it had to of been pretty late at night because we had recently come back to our camp site after seeing paul mccartney (the last set of the night i believe). we had not done any drugs or had drank recently as we were worn out from the drinking earlier the day before, we had taken some adderall but we both had a prescription for it so the effects were no different then any other day and if anything would cause us to be more alert and observant. we were sitting in his car just talking for awhile trying to get away from the chaos for a bit and as he was speaking to me i kept looking  out of the passenger side window at the stars. since we were basically on a farm and there were no clouds you could see way more stars then you usually would in the bright city. at one point i looked out and i noticed what i thought were 3 bright stars in a triangular shape until i saw them move! they would be completely still in suspension/hovering and then would just move in a random direction very quickly and perfectly(right, straight down, and then straight up etc.). when i say "still" i mean there was no bobbing or anything as they moved like maybe a helicopter would do, so i don't think air resistance was involved or a contributing factor to it's flight(the "ship" or what ever didn't seem to need to be aerodynamic), just perfect intended straight lines and then solid very controlled stillness in the air as if that spot in the air was supporting them like the ground would or how actual stars are still and stuck in their positions in the sky(from our perspective). this is necessary to mention because the "stars/lights" them selves were not necessarily still, they appeared to move or morph while in sky (i don't know why but i had an impression that it was to make the movement more fluid or something maybe balancing the energy i don't know). while all three continued to appear connected ( by invisible edges) they would seem to move geometrically such as the triangle would become more acute or obtuse (coming forward, backwards, sideways) at certain points but would always stay connected. generally they stayed within a smaller area in the sky as they moved around, if i were to put my hands up in the sky to measure the distance,from my perspective it would be the equivalent of about a foot between two hands in the sky and it looked pretty high so i guess that would probably pan out to a distance of a couple miles if i have to guesstimate. another thing we both noticed was that the space occupied in between the star-like lights while transparent or invisible seemed to distort light a little bit like the way heat does rising from hot pavement, this was another reason for us to believe that they were connected. we watched this for a minute or so when it suddenly (for lack of a better word) beamed away in an instant, almost like it got sucked away from the space it was in, essentially vanishing. we were both in aw and also i think grateful to be with each other at the time to verify our sanity. oddly enough my boyfriend seemed to get over it rather quickly as i on the other hand was practically in a trance looking at that same space in the sky that the lights disappeared from. i noticed something really strange start to become visible to me after it "beamed" away, it was like a huge grid system way up in the atmosphere connecting everything, i had never seen this before but i felt a weird sense of understanding or familiarity with it when i saw it, like i knew somehow intuitively that the "light ship" thing i just saw worked with that grid some how, it was a very strange yet satisfying feeling and i just kind of accepted it at the time. when our other friends came back to the camp site an hour or so later i yelled from my tent what we had saw earlier and asked if they had seen it also. in their drunken' stupor they laughed at the idea and patronizingly suggested that we were probably drunk and saw something as mundane as some lanterns in the sky(out of all the possibilities), at which point it was clear to me that it was not worth our time to share such an experience with them and went to bed.
content.summary: What looked like three invisibly connected star-like or bright white lights forming triangular formations in the sky seemed like a vessel

content.detailedDescription: I took pictures of the sky on a few nights but didn't check the pictures for a week or so. when i checked the pictures i saw a strange orb shape, there are two pictures with the orb at different positions in the sky. the images were taken a couple of seconds apart. i zoomed in on the object and what i see i feel warrants some investigation. i would love to know what i captured.
content.summary: Found in pictures after they were taken, zoomed in and saw orb

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on the porch at 2am looked to the left and noticed a large round pulsating light above my neighbors house. it appeared as if it was hovering, it was stationary and was a yellow and orange round ball of light with yellow rays extending from it. it was approximately 1 quarter the size of the house i sat and watched it for about 30 minutes and it never moved but continued to pulsate. i saw no one else outside anywhere, so i went in to get someone to come see it but when i went back outside it was gone. i checked the news the next day to see if there was anything on there about it but apparently no one else reported it. observing it i was mesmerized and i remember wondering if i was witnessing a ufo. i was never afraid only fascinated and extremely curious.
content.summary: Large orange/yellow pulsating light with rays hovering above house

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were celebrating new years eve in the hot tub.  it was a clear, cool evening.  around 12:20 she went inside while i took my time getting out of the tub and closing it down.  i stood at the back deck railing just enjoying the feel of the evening.  

in my left peripheral vision i picked up on a glow and looked to see an orange sphere glowing from behind the bare tree branched.  it had the appearance of a harvest moon - but it was in the wrong place and too late for that, plus it was moving.  when it cleared the trees, it took up as much of my field of vision as a softball (maybe bigger)held at arms length.  it moved slowly, steadily, and silently.  

i considered whether or not it was a balloon but it was perfectly round and had no gondola or gas ignition sounds.  it wasn't a helicopter with a down light - no sound; no beam.  it had nothing to do with fireworks.  i just silently, peacefully watched as it slowly moved toward the ne and disappeared behind the terrain.  i didn't even think about going in to get my wife or a camera.  i just wanted to watch it.
content.summary: From my back deck i saw a very orange object passing by,

content.detailedDescription: This past sunday night at 11 my teenage daughters (16 &18) were driving home from work. they work together at a restaurant about 5 miles from home. they noticed what they thought was a search helicopter with two lights shining down. they thought i wonder who they’re looking for. while parked in front of our house they noticed it was above the neighborhood. search helicopters are loud/noisy, my daughter said this wasn’t noisy at all.  then all the sudden it was in front of the car, as low down as the roof of our 2 level house. the bottom was completely circular like a ufo, the spotlights pointed off to the sides (white lights). it tilted on its side & had lights going around it (red, green, blue). the side width was not very high. the width of the bottom was about 2 of her cars in front of each other. i said did you take a picture, she said we were in shock & it happened so fast. a couple days later my older daughter still trying to make sense of it, said maybe it was a search helicopter. i’m going to google helicopters to see if they’re starting to make them look like ufo’s.
content.summary: While driving home from work my two daughters thought they were seeing a search helicopter until it was in front of them.

content.detailedDescription: Read the flying sub trilogy for a complete description
content.summary: Look like a flying sub

content.detailedDescription:
While driving in a dark street in nevada (i was going from wells to ely at night time) i saw a light appearing behind me in the distance. at first i thought it was a car, then we saw (other two people were in the car with me at that moment) the light coming closer to us and then moving from the street to the field at its left in a horizontal way. the light was still pointing at us but it was moving right to left, like if it wasn't touching the street. after a bit we saw a car driving to the opposite direction, and when the car reached the light (that at that moment it looked like it was back on the street) both turned off. after few seconds we saw the light appearing again. few minutes later a big truck got between us and the light and few minutes later the truck disappeared and the light was back again behind us. it took off a bit (like if it was flying) and then it came back on the street. sometimes it was changing shape and after disappearing for a longer time we saw three lights on the field at our left. then two lights disappeared and the one that was still on came back on the street like if it was fluctuating few feet from the street (from left to right). few other cars came from the opposite direction and some of them were disappearing as soon as they were close to that light while some of them were just passing by it. the street was perfectly straight, no bumps, no turns. all of the sudden it got really close to us and when another car, coming from another direction, passed us by, the light turned off and the object got hit by the other car's lights and i could see a conical disk behind us. dark violet/black color, as large as the the lane of the street. once we started approaching ely, the light disappeared for good.
we made a video but it's too dark to see anything.
content.summary: Dark violet/black conical disk with a bright light in the front followed my car
